Tutorial1: Click on the green start field
Tutorial2: The blue color indicates that this field belongs to the pattern.
Tutorial3: The goal is to complete the pattern.
Tutorial4: As a hint, the field now shows how many of the yellow fields belong to the pattern.
Tutorial5: Now try to find the two yellow fields that belong to the pattern.
Tutorial6: Unfortunately, that's not part of the pattern, try again.
Tutorial7: Well done! You found both fields.
Tutorial8: Now try to complete the pattern.
Tutorial9: As a small help, you now get a progress bar that shows you how much of the pattern you have already found.
Tutorial10: You found a part of the pattern, well done.
Tutorial11: Now try to find the next one.
Tutorial12: Congratulations! You have completed the tutorial. You can now play the game.
